Text: ... And here I was thinking that cretin was bound to tear you a new one...
Colour me impressed, kid. You clearly know your stuff!
Tell me, what brings young talent like yourself to a shithole like this?
Heh, not much. Just workin' with the feds as usual. It's kind of my thing.
Recently we've been getting reports of cult behaviour operating on this island.
Nothing super concrete or anything, but still worth looking into.
Cult behaviour, ay? I might've heard a thing or two about that...
Nothing beyond a hushed whisper here and there, but I'd definitely wager some shady stuff is going down round these parts...
I'd recommened asking around the local population for any leads.
Whlist small in numbers, they're a damn characterful bunch.
So, what, you embarking on this mission yourself?
